subject: NOT JUNK: STILL VALID/INDICA
body:
NOT JUNK: STILL VALID/INDICATE OWNERSHIP
Attn: Sir,
In case you have not been informed based on your Email ID, you are to receive your an abandoned fund and an approved palliative measure funds from IMF AND WORLD BANK respectively through our bank, Deutsche Ag, London on Ref: DEBT-WBL.IMF/XXXCREDIT.002023-24/FRMON.QBNK-23/4 respectively.
This is to inform you further that your claim listed later December 2023 to be paid via our affiliate under Mr. Erick  Schmitz of Deutsche Bank, Zurich Switzerland ;Account Auditing department officer is STILL VALID rescheduled this quarter as a result of some good reasons.
By the new arrangements, you are to be paid through a correspondent bank in Europe which the details will be sent to you as soon as you give your consent in a return mail. Kindly indicate your current phone,address and any identification of you. 
Wishing you a speedy and hitch-free payment exercise.
Yours Sincerely
Mr. Sanchez Moore.
Payment Departments, Deutsche bank Ag, London
Email: 
deutschemanagement@gmail.com

subject: Re:   NOT JUNK: STILL VALID/INDICA
body:
Hello Mr. Sanchez Moore,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. It's quite surprising to hear about the abandoned fund and the approved palliative measure funds from IMF AND WORLD BANK. I must admit, I'm not entirely sure what all of this means.

Could you please explain a bit more about these funds? How did they come to be abandoned and why have they been approved for me? Also, could you clarify what you mean by "palliative measure funds"?

I'm also curious about Mr. Erick Schmitz of Deutsche Bank, Zurich Account Auditing department officer. What is his role in all of this?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Pedro
